text.section: Except for a license issued under § 18-303(g) of this subtitle, before issuing a license, the Secretary shall conduct a State and national criminal records check for each applicant who applies for a license.
If the applicant is a firm, the Secretary shall conduct a State and national criminal records check for each firm member.
